text: I see a lot of movies. I love films as a spectator, and that's never obscured by the part of me that does the work myself. I just love going to the movies.
author: Daniel Day-Lewis

text: Where I come from, it was a heresy to say you wanted to be in movies, leave alone American movies.
author: Daniel Day-Lewis

text: My children have never watched any of my films. Charlie knows that daddy makes movies, but he says they are not good enough for him to watch.
author: Russell Crowe

text: I'm not an admirer of action movies. I just think, Oh my God, it must be so tiring.
author: Catherine Deneuve

text: How do people relate to movies now, when they're on portable devices or streaming them? It's not as much about going to the movies. That experience has changed.
author: Keanu Reeves
